field.name: field
field.label: Field name (jr_fieldname)
field.description: You should use a single select or radio button field here.

field.name: ranges
field.label: Ranges (0-100+100-200+200-300+300)
field.description: Enter the numeric ranges in the specified format. The last value without an upper range will be used to show all numbers above that value.

field.name: tmpl_suffix
field.label: JReviews Theme Suffix
field.description: Suffix to be applied to the global search results template.

field.name: itemid_options
field.label: Itemid selection
field.description: You can control the itemid used for the field option links so that modules on the current page are seen on the result list or not.

field.name: separator
field.label: Range separator
field.description: Goes in between the numbers in the range.

field.name: before_text
field.label: Before text
field.description: This text will appear before the list. You can use html tags.

field.name: catauto
field.label: Category Auto Detect
field.description: If a category is found for the page, the results will be limited to that category. If it's a section list, then the results will be limited to categories for that section. If no category is found then the module will use the listing type and category settings below if they are set.

field.name: criteria
field.label: Listing Type ID (single value)
field.description: Limit results to all categories with the same listing type.

field.name: cat
field.label: Category IDs (comma list)
field.description: Separate values with comma. Limit results to specified categories. No need to specify listing type id above.

field.name: custom_params
field.label: Custom URL parameters
field.description: Add any other custom search parameters you want. This could be custom field filters (i.e. jr_brand:canon) or custom ordering (order:jr_price).
